content:
I was looking at something today, and found that this example isn't showing a narrative:
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/Bundle-diagnosticreport-pgxexample.html

In comparing with other Bundle examples, I can't find a reason why it wouldn't work? When I look at the 'raw XML' it seems to actually show that the XML was generated OK:
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/genomics-reporting/Bundle-diagnosticreport-pgxexample.xml
image.png

Anyone have a bit to take a look?
